# Silken Hollow

**Dungeon Timer: 13:00**  
**PUG Route:** [Open Route in Method.gg](https://www.method.gg/fellowship/route-planner/silken-hollow#)  
**Advanced Route:** [Open Route in Method.gg](www.method.gg/fellowship/route-planner/silken-hollow#)

---

## üßπ Trash Mobs (Adept)

??? note "Tanks (click to expand)"
    - **Booly Basher** ‚Äî Together Stronger MUST be interrupted (20% damage reduc to everything)
    - **Egg Layers** ‚Äî Spawns 3 Spiderlings on Death.  Need to pickup with AOE damage
    - **Venom Drinkers (Adept)** ‚Äî Spawn Tornado that applies DOT, this should be kited
    - **Kidnappers** ‚Äî Always face spiders away from group, Frontal Cone of webs (We need to dodge)

??? note "Healers (click to expand)"
    - **Recluse** ‚Äî Heartstopper DOT (Lethal Damage at end) must be dispelled

??? note "DPS (click to expand)"
    - **Booly Basher** ‚Äî Together Stronger MUST be interrupted (20% damage reduc to everything)
    - **Kidnapper** ‚Äî Kidnap should interrupted.  Massive Damage on random party member.

??? note "Everyone (click to expand)"
    - **Facestabbers** ‚Äî Jump to random party member and cast "Stab Face" (heavy channeled damage). CC, Defensive, or big heals.
    - **Avoid PoisonNado as it aplies a DOT** Tank will be kiting Tornado.
    - **Carrion Horror (Big Red Spider)** ‚Äî Does raidwide damage with DOT (Mass Dispel DOT)

---

## üßë‚Äçüíº Boss: Vexira, Mother of Nightmares

??? note "Tanks (click to expand)"
    - **Fang Strike (Quiet Tankbuster)** ‚Äî Pop Defensive for this
    - **Call Children** ‚Äî Right First (Facing Door), then alternates. Pre-position to pick up adds.
    - **Venom Spray x3** ‚Äî First one always targets tank. Try to point first one away from party.

??? note "Healers (click to expand)"
    - **Recluses Spawn with Call Children** ‚Äî Raid-wide AoE or sustained damage phases.  

??? note "DPS (click to expand)"
    - **Call Children** ‚Äî Hard Swap to Adds.  They must be dead before mother's milk cast!
    - Tank will move boss to right side (Facing entrance door) of room until first Call Children cast, then he will drag everything to left side of room to prepare for second cast.  
    - If you are targeted by spiders ground AOE, kite out of melee.  I don't care about your uptime.

??? note "Everyone (click to expand)"
    - Core fight mechanics that affect all roles.  
    - **Call Children** - Trash Spiders summoned. Let tank get aggro and Interrupt Kidnap / Dispell Heartstopper
    - **Puddle of Spiders** - Tracks random party member (changes multiple times).  Kite out of melee if you are targeted (Tank too! Move Boss away)
    - **Venom Spray (cast x3 First on Tank)** - Lots of AOE circles to dodge.
    - **Tether** - Spread to break or get stunned and eaten.
